system.requirements:
Tier 3; BS 45, Solid Projectile Weapon Mastery 
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
system.effect: When Character fires a Solid Projectile Weapon, it gains Proven(Ballistic Skill Bonus/2), rounded up.

description.value: When Character fires a Solid Projectile Weapon, it gains Proven(Ballistic Skill Bonus/2), rounded up.
